title: Lemon curd and pistachio meringue roulade
description: This is a great chilled dessert to feed a crowd, and impress them too. Often egg yolks are left over after making meringue, but here they’re used to make lemon curd and to give a luxurious filling.This recipe makes more lemon curd than you need to fill the roulade. The extra can be stored in a jar, and given as a homemade Easter present.Equipment: You will need an electric mixer.
ingredients: 50g/1¾ oz shelled pistachio nuts, finely chopped
3 large lemons, juice and finely grated zest
